data.name: Hue Hills
data.detailed_description:
Let your imagination run wild and 3D paint an infinitely generated world or challenge your friends in guessing or strategy games.

Alone or with friends, choose from the three game modes that Hue Hills offers:
  • 3D Draw

    Roam around an infinitely generated world and shape it the way you like. You can choose from a variety of colors for every line. Use flying mode for a more accurate design. Give your lines colliders or walk right through them!

  • Guess Draw

    Challenge your friends to a draw guessing battle. Each player gets to chose their own word and has 1 minute to show off their drawing skills! The chat is where everyone takes their guess. Be quick! The earlier you answer correctly the more points you get!

  • Paper Soccer

    This strategy game will put your brain to a challenge up against your friends. Take your time and think at every step! Each move could lead you to either victory or loss.
